title: Online Parent Education: Effective Communication Strategies with Adolescents

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Childcare Experience and Digital Platform Proficiency
context.additional_context: Professionals with time constraints, experienced in asynchronous collaboration using personal devices, and possessing language-domain-based educational backgrounds.

learning_goals: Within four weeks, apply three nonviolent communication techniques in real-life conflict situations with adolescents.
Collaborate with peer learners using online tools (e.g., Google Docs, Skype) to produce one parenting case analysis report.
At the course’s conclusion, diagnose the degree of change in one’s parenting style on a 5-point scale through peer evaluation.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
